trans-unit.source: Represents a set of methods for creating instances of a provider's implementation of the data source classes.
trans-unit.target: Representa um conjunto de métodos para criar instâncias de uma implementação de provedor das classes de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de uma classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" />.

trans-unit.source: Use one of the `DbProviderFactories.GetFactory` methods to get an instance of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory>.
trans-unit.target: Use um do `DbProviderFactories.GetFactory` métodos para obter uma instância de <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the specific <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" /> supports the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" /> específico dá suporte à classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" /> supports the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator" /> class; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a instância do <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" /> oferece suporte a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator" /> classe; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the provider's version of the <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a versão do provedor da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> object for the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> especificado.
